text: Grassy Creek may refer to: ==The Bahamas== * Little Grassy Creek ==Canada== * Rural Municipality of Grassy Creek No. 78, Saskatchewan ==United States== Populated places * Grassy Creek, Kentucky, Morgan County * Grassy Creek, Ashe County, North Carolina *Grassy Creek Township, Ashe County, North Carolina Streams *Grassy Creek (Salt River), a stream in Missouri *Grassy Creek (Deep River tributary), a stream in Moore County, North Carolina *Grassy Creek (Rocky River tributary), a stream in Union County, North Carolina *Grassy Creek (Elkin Creek tributary), a stream in Wilkes and Surry counties, North Carolina ==See also== * Grassy Lake (disambiguation)
title: Grassy Creek
